name: Catch Turmeric Powder
description:
Turmeric and especially its most active compound curcumin have many scientifically-proven health benefits, such as the potential to prevent heart disease, Alzheimer’s and cancer.

It’s a potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant and may also help improve symptoms of depression and arthritis. [Source: www.healthline.com] *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
